meanings.definition: Photographs of celestial objects or phenomena taken with a telescope or camera.
meanings.sent1: I love looking at astrophotographs of the stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a stunning collection of astrophotographs showcasing the beauty of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The astrophotographs in the magazine made me dream of exploring outer space.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with astrophotographs, turning it into a mini observatory.
meanings.sent5: The astrophotographs captured the magic of the night sky, making it feel within reach.

meanings.definition: To take photographs of stars, planets, galaxies, or other astronomical objects.
meanings.sent1: I plan to astrophotograph the Milky Way during the meteor shower.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys astrophotographing constellations on clear nights.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut astrophotographs the Earth from the space station for fun.
meanings.sent4: He astrophotographs the moon every month to track its phases.
meanings.sent5: Astrophotographing distant galaxies requires patience and precision.
